parameter.name: IIS Web Application Name
parameter.description: Full site path where you want to install your application.

parameter.name: AppDataLogFolderAcl
parameter.description: Full site or physical path where you want to apply this ACL (for example, Default Web Site/Application or c:\Folder\SubFolder).
parameter.defaultValue: {IIS Web Application Name}\App_Data\logs

parameter.name: Collection Shard Map Manager Database Name
parameter.description: Collection Shard Map Manager Database Name

parameter.name: Search SOLR Core Application Connection String

Marketing Automation Database Application User Name
Marketing Automation Database Application User Password
Collection Shard Map Manager Database Connection String
parameter.description: Collection Shard Map Manager Database Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Collection Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Collection Shard Map Manager Database Name}

parameter.name: Collection Shard 0 Database Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Collection Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Collection Shard 0 Database Name}

parameter.name: Collection Shard 1 Database Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Collection Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Collection Shard 1 Database Name}

parameter.name: Processing Pool Database Connection String
parameter.description: Enter the connection string where to deploy the Processing Pool database.
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Processing Pools Database Name}

parameter.name: Marketing Automation Database Connection String
parameter.description: Enter the connection string where to deploy the Marketing Automation database
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Marketing Automation Database Name}

parameter.name: Messaging Database Connection String
parameter.description: Enter the connection string where to deploy the Messaging database
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Messaging Database Name}

parameter.name: Reference Data Database Connection String
parameter.description: Enter the connection string where to deploy the Reference Data database
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Database Admin User Name};password={Database Admin User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Reference Data Database Name}

parameter.name: Collection Shard Map Manager Database Application Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Collection Database Application User Name};password={Collection Database Application User Password};data source={Collection Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Collection Shard Map Manager Database Name}

parameter.name: Marketing Automation Database Application Connection String
parameter.description: Marketing Automation Database Application Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Marketing Automation Database Application User Name};password={Marketing Automation Database Application User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Marketing Automation Database Name}

parameter.name: Messaging Database Application Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Messaging Database Application User Name};password={Messaging Database Application User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Messaging Database Name}

parameter.name: Reference Data Database Application Connection String
parameter.description: Reference Data Database Application Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: user id={Reference Data Database Application User Name};password={Reference Data Database Application User Password};data source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Reference Data Database Name}

parameter.defaultValue: {XConnect Server Log Level}

parameter.description: Marketing Automation Engine Xconnect Collection Client Endpoint Connection String

parameter.description: Marketing Automation Engine Xconnect Collection Client Certificate Connection String
parameter.defaultValue: StoreName=My;StoreLocation=LocalMachine;FindType=FindByThumbprint;FindValue={Marketing Automation Engine Xconnect Collection Client Certificate Thumbprint}
